Pre-Game Insights: The Jazz are aiming to halt a 4-game skid against the Knicks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks are 10-4 on their home court.
The Jazz have gone 5-12 away from home.
Others: The Knicks average 117.8 points per game, 2.0 fewer points than the 119.8 the Jazz give up.
Karl-Anthony Towns is averaging 24.7 points, 13.5 rebounds and 3.3 assists for the Knicks.
John Collins is averaging 17.7 points and 8.2 rebounds for the Jazz.
